title: Chicago White Sox revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 18 data points.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 272.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 101.0 was reached at Year 2001
